word:
I know that if the way were only prepared, there would be in Battle Creek such a sacred kindling of love and zeal commenced upon the hearts of the very men who need this work but who have themselves barred the way that it shall not come, and men who are now in unbelief would receive communications from heaven 
                                                                           753
and would be proclaiming, "Prepare ye the way of the Lord and make His paths straight."
